object.name: StoryAreaTypeLink
object.description: Describes a story area pointing to an HTTP or tg:// link. Currently, a story can have up to 3 link areas.
object.html_description: Describes a story area pointing to an HTTP or tg:// link. Currently, a story can have up to 3 link areas.
object.rst_description: Describes a story area pointing to an HTTP or tg:// link. Currently, a story can have up to 3 link areas.

annotations.description: HTTP or tg:// URL to be opened when the area is clicked
annotations.html_description: HTTP or tg:// URL to be opened when the area is clicked
annotations.rst_description: HTTP or tg:// URL to be opened when the area is clicked
annotations.name: url
